content.query:
create SCHEMA staging go

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'Parquet_file_Format') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [Parquet_file_Format] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'nyc-taxi-data_DedicatedSQLPool') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [nyc-taxi-data_DedicatedSQLPool] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@dlsrsynapsecourse.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.etx_trip_data_agg (
	[PULocationID] int,
	[DOLocationID] int,
	[total_trip_count] bigint,
	[total_fare_amount] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold_layer/trip_data_green_agg/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [nyc-taxi-data_DedicatedSQLPool],
	FILE_FORMAT = [Parquet_file_Format]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.etx_trip_data_agg
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.tripdata (
	[year] nvarchar(4000),
	[month] nvarchar(4000),
	[trip_date] date,
	[Borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[trip_day] nvarchar(4000),
	[weekend_ind] nvarchar(4000),
	[card_trips_count] int,
	[cash_trips_count] int,
	[count_Dispatch_trips] int,
	[count_Street_hail_trips] int,
	[total_trip_distance] float,
	[total_fare_amount] float,
	[total_duration] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold_layer/final_reporting_data',
	DATA_SOURCE = [nyc-taxi-data_DedicatedSQLPool],
	FILE_FORMAT = [Parquet_file_Format]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.tripdata
GO
